name: Dr. Damien P. Williams, Magus (@Wolven@ourislandgeorgia.net)
summary:
Twitter's new privacy policy takes effect 09/29/23, giving them the right to use your posts & all of your data to train musk's "AI."

Elon Musk's. "AI."

If you're still over there, now is the time to request your archived data, delete your posts, and stop using that site.
